reuze

Class ib_FilterDilate

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_a_FilterWholeImage
        • reuze.ib_a_FilterBinary
          • reuze.ib_FilterDilate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp, java.io.Serializable

    public class ib_FilterDilate
extends ib_a_FilterBinary
    Given a binary image, this filter performs binary dilation, setting all added pixels to the given 'new' color.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
